item.title: Featured Articles
item.description: Let us know if you have published using clusterProfiler and your publication will be featured here. 2018 p38-MK2 signaling axis regulates RNA metabolism after UV-light-induced DNA damage. Nature Communications. 2018, 9:1017. Transcription factor Hoxb5 reprograms B cells into functional T lymphocytes. Nature Immunology. 2018. The effects of death and post-mortem cold ischemia on human tissue transcriptomes. Nature Communications. 2018, 9:490. Haploinsufficiency leads to neurodegeneration in C9ORF72 ALS/FTD human induced motor neurons.
